alert.note: Alert for Hardee; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hardee and southwestern Polk Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Ona, or 10 miles northwest of Wauchula, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bradley Junction and Fort Green. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
